tool_description: An API showing all the latest news from the world of Formula 1.
name: F1 News
title: F1 News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about F1 from a specific news source.

api_list.name: Get All F1 News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about F1.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
